summary: A lore-friendly voice pack exported from warcraft 3 for Additional Player Voices
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][color=#00ffff][size=3][/size][/color][/u][/b][/center][center][b][u][color=#00ffff][size=3][/size][/color][/u][/b][/center][b][u][color=#00ffff][size=3] ﻿﻿Description:
[/size][/color][/u][/b]﻿I made this voice pack for my characters and I want to share with you. I tried to make it lore-friendly as much as possible.

I made this for my personal skyrim and for those who need it, all credit go to the resource owner (Blizzard Entertainment) and the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url]﻿'s author ([url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4911907]nanahane[/url]) . If the community don't accept this due to copywriting matter, then it's fine to take down this mod.
[b][color=#00ffff][size=3][u]
﻿﻿Contents:[/u][/size][/color][/b]
[b][color=#00ff00]Male voice:[/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*]Grom Hellscream:  suitable for orc, brute, berserker, warrior,...
[*]Pit Lord: for evil-type characters
[*]Shadow Hunter: may fit the khajit, argonian
[*]Illidan: for demon hunters, villain characters
[*]Arthas Holy: for those who stand for the light
[*]Arthas Unholy: evil, villain characters
[*]Lord Garithos: ... (I'm running out of word to describe these voices) Please search Warcraft 3 Lord Garithos for more info

[/list]
[b][color=#00ff00]Female voice:[/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*]Elf Archer: for elven archer, what else? This is an combine voice of Sylvanas Windrunner and night elf archer. Might suit some other female characters
[*]Shandris: nord, commander type like Aela,...
[*]Succubus: for vampire, orc
[*]Dryad: young girl voice
[*]Warden: for those who stand for justice

[/list]
Both will replace the set3 voice of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url]﻿

I may expand this mod for more voice sets if you are interested, just comment and I'll see what I can do. But don't expect too much because not every character in Warcraft 3 has enough dialogue to convert to skyrim.

[b][u][color=#00ffff][size=3] ﻿Requirement:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url]﻿

[color=#00ffff][size=3][b][u] ﻿Installation:[/u][/b][/size][/color]
- Install the requirement mod
- Pick your voice set
- Copy to your Data folder

or use Mod Organization, your life will be saved
Remember to enable voice in-game and set voice type to type3

[b][u][color=#00ffff][size=3] ﻿﻿Tool Used:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
War3 World Editor for sound exporting

[color=#00ffff][size=3][b][u] ﻿Credit:[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4911907]nanahane[/url] for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url][/size]
Blizzard Entertainment

[b][color=#00ffff][size=3][u]﻿Changelog:
[/u][/size][/color][/b][list]
[*]V1.2: add Garithos, Arthas Holy, Warden and Dryad
[*]V1.1: add Illidan, Arthas Unholy, Shadow Hunter, Elf Archer, Shandris and Succubus
[*]V1.0: first upload with Grom, Pit Lord voices
[/list]
author: Wavin
